sourcesContent:
TODO:

  • {{entry.entry}} - Due:[{{entry.dueDate | date:'short'}}] - priority: {{entry.priority}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { FormBuilder } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'app-frontend'; entries:Entry[] =[]; todoForm = this.formBuilder.group({ entry: '', dueDate: '', priority:'' }); constructor(private http: HttpClient, private formBuilder: FormBuilder) { this.getAll(); } getAll(){ this.http.get('http://localhost:8080/getAll') .subscribe(data => { console.log(data); this.entries=data; }, error=>{ console.log(error); }); } onSubmit(): void { this.http.post('http://localhost:8080/add',this.todoForm.value) .subscribe(data => { console.log(data); }, error=>{ console.log(error); }); this.getAll(); } } interface Response { value: string } interface Entry { id: string, entry: string, priority: string, dueDate: Date }
